title: Jack-o'-Lanterns
subtle:

description: A festive sight on doorsteps, on porches, and in windows, jack-o'-lanterns are popular Halloween decorations. Jack-o'-Lanterns provides students an introduction to the history of this tradition as well as a glimpse into the creative liberties people have taken over the years to create jack-o'-lantern masterpieces. The book can also be used to teach students how to discern fact or opinion and to identify synonyms and antonyms. The book and lesson are also available for levels K and Q.
